text: Ceroplesis sumptuosa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pascoe in 1875. It is known from South Africa, Angola, Zimbabwe and Malawi.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis sumptuosa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesini Category:Beetles described in 1875
title: Ceroplesis sumptuosa
